Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, south of the Ivanhouse Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The Ivanhouse Sporting Facility is located to the north. There is an entrance to the north labeled "Challenger's Ready Room". Those who wish to compete in the Arena may do so by entering this large room to the north. On the south side of Netherworld Lane is the Khelleva Estate. This massive estate covers nearly two whole city blocks and has been the home of the Khelleva Family for nearly twenty generations.
